price: 5. Ni Rabbow! koroosite marih mokkoro (aqayyaare) nee maabin ken gabat nee digaaltaah ni diinik nee korsaanamal, kaadu ni Rabbow dambi neh cab, diggah Atu maysoliy как ayse waana kinnito, isi ginoh abtaamal naggaar kinnitok.
arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا رَبَّنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
category: She that is to be Examined

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fit'natan lilladhīna kafarū wa-igh'fir lanā rabbanā innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
